title: WAR of the ROHIRRIM! New LOTR Animated Film on the way!
description: Let's talk live about the HUGE news from today - an animated Middle-earth film is in the works from New Line Cinema and Warner Bros. Animation!  Kenji Kamiyama (Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex) will direct, with Jeffrey Addiss and Will Matthews (The Dark Crystal: Age of Resistance) writing.
